whatIs.title: What is Runway Aleph?
whatIs.description: Runway Aleph represents the next evolution in video editing AI - a revolutionary in-context video model that combines multi-task visual generation with conversational intelligence. This advanced AI video editor transforms ordinary footage through intelligent object manipulation, dynamic camera control, and seamless style modification. Unlike traditional video tools, Runway Aleph operates as a creative partner, understanding visual context to deliver fluid editing experiences that edit, transform, and generate professional video content effortlessly.

examples.title: Runway Aleph Examples
examples.description: Discover how Runway Aleph revolutionizes video creation through intelligent in-context editing and multi-task visual generation capabilities.
examples.generateCameraAngles: Camera Angle Generation - Generate new camera perspectives and shots from your original footage with professional cinematography techniques
examples.generateNextShot: Next Shot Generation - Create seamless follow-up shots that continue your narrative with intelligent scene understanding
examples.styleTransfer: Style Transfer - Transform your video's visual style while maintaining the original motion and content integrity
examples.changeEnvironment: Environment Changes - Add atmospheric elements like rain, snow, or environmental modifications to enhance your scenes
examples.addThings: Add Objects - Seamlessly integrate new elements like fireworks, props, or environmental features into existing footage
examples.removeThings: Remove Objects - Eliminate unwanted elements like smoke, reflections, or distracting objects while maintaining scene continuity
examples.generateStyleTransfer: Style Transfer - Transform any video with your desired aesthetic. With Runway Aleph, you can easily apply any style to your footage just by asking for it.
examples.generateChangeObject: Change Object - Runway Aleph allows you to easily retexture or entirely replace objects, subjects and more from existing videos. Either with a text prompt or a reference image of what you'd like to swap into your video.
examples.promptStyleTransfer: Prompt: Transfer the style of the video
examples.promptChangeObject: Prompt: Change the material of the ball to lava
examples.promptCameraAngle: Prompt: Generate a medium full shot of the subject

step1.title: Upload Your Footage
step1.content: Import any video file (MP4, MOV, AVI) up to 15 seconds and 50MB for Runway Aleph processing. Videos exceeding 15 seconds are automatically optimized for efficient in-context video model analysis.

step2.title: In-Context Analysis
step2.content: Runway Aleph analyzes your footage using advanced multi-task visual generation algorithms, extracting the first frame to establish visual context for consistent AI editing throughout your video.

step3.title: Select Enhancement Mode
step3.content: Choose from 20+ intelligent transformation options including object manipulation, camera control, style modification, or use conversational prompts with reference images for custom Runway Aleph edits.

step4.title: Generate Enhanced Video
step4.content: Runway Aleph transforms your complete footage using in-context video model intelligence while preserving original motion, expressions, and timing through sophisticated fluid editing technology.

benefits.title: Why Choose Runway Aleph
benefits.description: Runway Aleph delivers the most advanced in-context video model technology with intelligent multi-task visual generation, conversational AI editing, and professional-grade results.

feature1.title: Intelligent Motion Preservation
feature1.content: Runway Aleph maintains perfect motion continuity, facial expressions, and temporal consistency while applying transformations through advanced in-context video model analysis and frame-perfect fluid editing precision.

feature2.title: 20+ Multi-Task Visual Styles
feature2.content: Access diverse transformation options including cinematic enhancements, artistic styles, object manipulation, and environmental changes. Create custom edits using conversational prompts or reference images with Runway Aleph.

feature3.title: Professional-Grade Output Quality
feature3.content: Generate cinema-quality videos with consistent multi-task visual generation, seamless transitions, and artifact-free results through Runway Aleph's sophisticated in-context video model processing.

feature4.title: Transparent Workflow System
feature4.content: Clear pricing structure with separate charges for analysis and generation phases. Experiment with different enhancement options without additional processing costs using Runway Aleph's flexible system.

feature5.title: Conversational AI Interface
feature5.content: Intuitive Runway Aleph workflow: upload footage, apply in-context analysis, generate enhanced video. No technical expertise required with real-time progress monitoring and conversational AI editing guidance.

feature6.title: Intelligent Auto-Optimization
feature6.content: Smart Runway Aleph processing with automatic format optimization, duration-based calculations, and intelligent file handling for seamless multi-task visual generation across all supported formats.

faq.title: Runway Aleph FAQ
faq.description: Essential information about Runway Aleph's in-context video model technology, multi-task visual generation capabilities, and conversational AI editing process.
faq.a1: Runway Aleph utilizes advanced in-context video model technology through intelligent two-phase processing: 1) Contextual analysis of your footage with multi-task visual generation assessment, 2) Fluid editing transformation while preserving motion and timing. This ensures consistent conversational AI editing across all frames.
faq.q2: What video formats does Runway Aleph support?
faq.a2: Runway Aleph supports MP4, MOV, and AVI formats with 50MB maximum file size for in-context video model processing. Videos are limited to 15 seconds and automatically optimized for efficient multi-task visual generation and cost effectiveness.
faq.q3: How long does Runway Aleph processing take?
faq.a3: Complete Runway Aleph transformation takes 5-10 minutes: in-context analysis (1-3 minutes) and multi-task visual generation (3-7 minutes). Monitor conversational AI editing progress in real-time through our intelligent interface.
faq.q4: What are Runway Aleph pricing details?
faq.a4: Separate charges for in-context analysis and video generation based on duration. Runway Aleph costs are displayed transparently before processing, and credits are only deducted after successful multi-task visual generation completion.
faq.q5: Can I create custom transformations with Runway Aleph?
faq.a5: Absolutely! Choose from 20+ preset templates, write conversational prompts, or upload reference images for unique multi-task visual generation with Runway Aleph's in-context video model technology.
faq.q6: What creates optimal results with Runway Aleph?
faq.a6: Best multi-task visual generation with clear subjects, adequate lighting, stable motion, and well-defined features. Avoid rapid movements or dark footage for optimal Runway Aleph in-context video model processing. Footage under 5 seconds with distinct subjects works exceptionally well.
